Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Los Angeles (N) in 2018...
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to Baltimore on 3/2/2018 (Going to LAD: P Gregory Bourbeau. Going to BAL: 2B Jacob Gatewood)...
Injured on 6/9/2018 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Baltimore to Atlanta on 7/30/2018 (Going to ATL: 2B Jacob Gatewood. Going to BAL: P JR Graham)...
Injured on 8/27/2018 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/4/2019, off Patrick Murphy (SD)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/7/2019, off Hector Santiago (CIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2021, hitting .591 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/10/2021 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 7 runs against San Francisco on 8/17/2022...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 5/25/2024...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,614,286 through salary arbitration...
8/1/2025: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $2,140,000 per year, for 2 years.
